meanings.definition: Moving or rotating in the same direction
meanings.sent1: The two wheels on the bicycle were corotating smoothly.
meanings.sent2: The planets in our solar system are corotating around the sun.
meanings.sent3: The synchronized dancers looked like corotating stars in the night sky.
meanings.sent4: The team's corotating efforts led to a successful project completion.
meanings.sent5: The corotating gears meshed perfectly, ensuring the machine's efficiency.

meanings.definition: Describing two or more objects that rotate together in the same direction
meanings.sent1: The corotating propellers on the airplane provided stability during the flight.
meanings.sent2: The corotating galaxies moved gracefully through the universe.
meanings.sent3: The synchronized swimmers resembled corotating fish in the water.
meanings.sent4: Their corotating dance moves captivated the audience.
meanings.sent5: The corotating wheels of the train clicked rhythmically on the tracks.
